description: This Lakshmi pendant is a timeless symbol of prosperity and good fortune. The exquisite craftsmanship, high-quality diamonds, and the traditional Nakshi design makes it a valuable heirloom piece. A perfect blend of tradition and elegance, handcrafted in Hyderabad.
